item.title: Iran protests: 2,500 killed, activists say, as judiciary promises swift trials
item.description: More than 2,500 people have died during nationwide protests in Iran over the past 17 days, activists said Wednesday.

item.title: WATCH: Is your dog eavesdropping on you?
item.description: New research suggests man's best friend is also listening in on conversations in an effort to learn from you.
